mapper.insert: insert into grade (student_id, subject_id, point) values (#{student.id}, #{subject.id}, #{point});
mapper.delete: delete from grade where student_id = #{student.id} and subject_id = #{subject.id};
mapper.select: select exists (select student_id from grade where student_id = #{student.id} and subject_id = #{subject.id});
mapper.update: update grade set point = #{point} where student_id = #{student.id} and subject_id = #{subject.id};
mapper.select: select stu.id as student_id, stu.name as student_name, sub.id as subject_id, sub.name as subject_name, gra.point from grade as gra join student as stu on gra.student_id = stu.id join subject as sub on gra.subject_id = sub.id where sub.id = #{id};
